word: I have been reported as saying you could not be saved unless you kept the Sabbath. Does it indeed seem meaningless, the requirement of the fourth commandment? Does not the habitual subjection to our heavenly Master\92s will lead the obedient to ask constantly and earnestly, not \93What is pleasing?\94 not \93What is the most convenient or agreeable to self or those around us?\94 but \93What does my Lord require? What is the will of God concerning me?\94
